profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyoneâ€™s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home â€“ NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workersâ€™ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STARÂ® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 â€“ ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 â€“ ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 â€“ ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 â€“ ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award â€“ Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.

services:
Arcana Windows and Doors offers a comprehensive range of services designed to meet the needs of todayâ€™s discerning homeowners. We begin by consulting with you to understand the aesthetics and the functionality you are looking to achieve. 
We then work with you every step of the way to ensure your complete satisfaction through every stage of the process. Our professional installation services include:

â€¢ Replacement of existing exterior windows and doors
â€¢ Retrofitting for smaller, larger or previously non-existent openings
â€¢ Cut-outs in siding, brick and stone
â€¢ Custom window and door fabrication
â€¢ Customized finishing carpentry services

As well, we welcome the especially difficult custom projects that other window and door companies shy away from.

profile:
A.C. Vinyl Windows started in 1986 as one of the earliest fabricators of PVC windows in Ontario, Canada.  We manufacture high-quality thermal windows primarily for renovations and private customized residential buildings. Our windows are built of lead-free UiPVC extrusions from industry leader, REHAU Industries, and only the finest quality dual seal insulating glass and hardware in our windows.  We want home owners to replace their windows with our windows for a lifetime of performance.
A.C. Vinyl Windows is a family-owned and operated company, incorporating two generations, whose founder Francisco (Frank) Cabral continues to work in his plant with his people and has had a very hands-on approach to management.  Our manufacturing facility in the Niagara Region has grown from 2,500 square feet to 22,000 square feet on 14 acres of prime industrial land.  We attribute our growth to thousands of referrals through word-of-mouth. We currently distribute windows through an extensive network of dealers throughout Ontario.  All our windows are custom-built to customer specifications.

A.C. Vinyl Windows retail division operates under the name of First Choice Vinyl Windows Ltd.
